body_html: @waichee: if building from source and only running in C++, then the protobuf parsing limit should be 2GiB,not 64. Unfortunately, protobuf doesn't support protos larger than 32-bit (and from my understanding, will not in the near future), so if you have a variable / constant larger than 2GiB, you probably have to manually shard it right now :(

body: @waichee: if building from source and only running in C++, then the protobuf parsing limit should be 2GiB,not 64.  Unfortunately, protobuf doesn't support protos larger than 32-bit (and from my understanding, will not in the near future), so if you have a variable / constant larger than 2GiB, you probably have to manually shard it right now :(
